Classes/Bugsnag.html.name: Bugsnag
Classes/Bugsnag.html.abstract: Static access to a Bugsnag Client, the easiest way to use Bugsnag in your app.

Classes/BugsnagApp.html.name: BugsnagApp
Classes/BugsnagApp.html.abstract: Stateless information set by the notifier about your app can be found on this class. These values

Classes/BugsnagAppWithState.html.abstract: Stateful information set by the notifier about your app can be found on this class. These values

Classes/BugsnagBreadcrumb.html.name: BugsnagBreadcrumb
Classes/BugsnagBreadcrumb.html.abstract: A short log message, representing an action that occurred in your app, to aid with debugging.

Classes/BugsnagClient.html.name: BugsnagClient
Classes/BugsnagClient.html.abstract: The BugsnagClient is not intended to be used directly.

Classes/BugsnagConfiguration.html.name: BugsnagConfiguration
Classes/BugsnagConfiguration.html.abstract: Contains user-provided configuration, including API key and endpoints.

Classes/BugsnagDevice.html.name: BugsnagDevice
Classes/BugsnagDevice.html.abstract: Stateless information set by the notifier about the device on which the event occurred can be

Classes/BugsnagDeviceWithState.html.name: BugsnagDeviceWithState
Classes/BugsnagDeviceWithState.html.abstract: Stateful information set by the notifier about the device on which the event occurred can be

Classes/BugsnagEndpointConfiguration.htm.name: BugsnagEndpointConfiguration
Classes/BugsnagEndpointConfiguration.htm.abstract: Set the endpoints to send data to. By default we’ll send error reports to

Classes/BugsnagError.html.name: BugsnagError
Classes/BugsnagError.html.abstract: An Error represents information extracted from an NSError, NSException, or other error source.

Classes/BugsnagErrorTypes.html.name: BugsnagErrorTypes
Classes/BugsnagErrorTypes.html.abstract: The types of error that should be reported.

Classes/BugsnagEvent.html.name: BugsnagEvent
Classes/BugsnagEvent.html.abstract: Represents an occurrence of an error, along with information about the state of the app and device.

Classes/BugsnagLastRunInfo.html.name: BugsnagLastRunInfo
Classes/BugsnagLastRunInfo.html.abstract: Contains information about the last run of the app.

Classes/BugsnagSession.html.name: BugsnagSession
Classes/BugsnagSession.html.abstract: Represents a session of user interaction with your app.

Classes/BugsnagStackframe.html.name: BugsnagStackframe
Classes/BugsnagStackframe.html.abstract: Represents a single stackframe from a stacktrace.

Classes/BugsnagThread.html.name: BugsnagThread
Classes/BugsnagThread.html.abstract: A representation of thread information recorded as part of a BugsnagEvent.

Classes/BugsnagUser.html.name: BugsnagUser
Classes/BugsnagUser.html.abstract: Information about the current user of your application.
